hero.description: I create modern, responsive and user-friendly web applications with a passion for detail and performance.

about-me.title: Creativity meets code
about-me.text1: As a passionate front-end developer, I combine technical know-how with creative design. My goal is to create web applications that are not only functional, but also impress with their user-friendliness and aesthetic design.
about-me.text2: With an eye for detail and a deep understanding of modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life and create digital experiences that inspire.
